author: imario
msg: Now the cache also frees any reference to the filesystem within vfs. That way, a layered filesystem (jar, zip) could also be correctly GCed.

author: imario
msg: fixed httpclient 2.0 as the api change to 3.0 will break vfs AND webdavclient

author: imario
msg: Close filesystem if there are no longer files cached for it.
This automatically closes the communication link to the underlaying filesystem.

author: imario
msg: when closing the manager - ensure the filescache is closed too

author: imario
msg: e.g. to release the underlaying communication link
